abstract.t: This document defines the scenario and solution for traffic engineering within Native IP network, using Dual/Multi-BGP session strategy and PCE-based central control architecture. The proposed central mode control solution conforms to the concept that defined in draft [I-D.draft-ietf-teas-pce-control-function], and together with draft [I-D.draft-zhao-teas-pcecc-use-cases], the solution portfolio for traffic engineering in MPLS and Native IP network is almost completed.
